name: Mafia Shoote: Street City War
description:
Mafia Shoote: Street City War is thrilling story of evil deeds in which you have to snatch the cars and different materialistic things from civilians. An action game related to gang crime ultimate war where you have to express yourself as gangster hero and become legend of criminal fighter war mafia. An amazing concept of shooting, chasing, running and snatching practice where you have to shoot the opposite enemies to conquer the war. Multiple fighting animations like punching and kicking in this crime combat will entertain you and you will rush towards the cities to rub the people
FEATURES:
Latest animations and fighting heroes
Multiple vehicles and ammunition
Traffic climate and city gang environment
Thrilling missions and strategies
Different camera angle views and points
Nonstop crime battle in urban areas
